channel.title: Server Rating
channel.description:
Okay first off:-
Note To Mods: If you think this is wrong, please lock no arguments..
Note To Everyone: Please do not flame if this is anyway at all breaking the rules.
-=-=- ## -=-=-
Ok i'm curious. I would like everyone's opinion if you decide to post.
-=-=- ## -=-=-
Which is the best Server source / Server base. Like, with the least bugs, constructed with expierience, lots of features, interesting and what not..
I was looking at [b][i]BattleScape Blitz[/i][/b], fully working skills, cool pking, nise timers and some Handlers.
My 2nd was [b][i]Project Destiny[/i][/b]. Working timers (Including food). Working projectiles. Etc..
-=-=- ## -=-=-
Now if you wouldn't mind, i'd like [i]YOUR[/i] opinion.
Please post.
-=-=- ## -=-=-
P.S ~ Please nothing like [b]Project16[/b] or [b]TestScape[/b] lol.
Tanx, much apreciated

item.title: Server Rating
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I have runescapes source. Wanna play on it? www.runescape.com

Lawl jkz.

Ya but, whats the best, besides runescape. And i did say (LEAST) bugs.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Rating
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:10, topic:152904”][quote author=rs w00dcut link=topic=209138.msg1833853#msg1833853 date=1192915438]
Hmm,I suggest another source lol
Penguinscape v.21
Just give some credits to 1 source instead of like 10 sources
[/quote]

Why penguinscape?.. Your saying its perfect? Hardly any bugs, all weapon timers, food timers, all skills etc?[/quote]Barely Any bugs,not all weapon timers(You can add),It has food timers I’m sure,Not all skills.But you have to add something lol
Btw-No source is perfect unless it’s runescape

Read full topic

item.title: Server Rating
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“rs w00dcut, post:4, topic:152904”]Well,If you want a good server I suggest fr33sc4p3 pkz,It’s really easy to code/train.
You can also add silabs and like maybe that torso Minigame[/quote]

Oh give me a break LEL, fr33sc4p3?.. I had that like 1 year ago. When every source was like pimpscape, or fr33sc4p3 or w.e… It lags. Not very good at all…

Waffles!!:

I say you take Testscape, and a few other popular sources. Take some stuff from the popular sources, such as handlers and whatever else is featured, and combine it with Testscape. Give credits to the servers and make a very good combo of servers.

Ya thats good idea, but we want to do it ourselves. So am not going to.

tedyslilnoob:

BattleScape Blitz sounds good

Yah

[quote=“rs w00dcut, post:7, topic:152904”][quote author=Waffles!! link=topic=209138.msg1833819#msg1833819 date=1192914868]
I say you take Testscape, and a few other popular sources. Take some stuff from the popular sources, such as handlers and whatever else is featured, and combine it with Testscape. Give credits to the servers and make a very good combo of servers.
[/quote]Alot of credits to alot of sources lol =[/quote]

Wont be happening. Lol

Anyone else?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Rating
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Well, at first i wasn’t gonna do anything, i just wanted opinions, but over the past few weeks, a couple of mates, and myself have decided to start a project. At the moment we dont want a dev team as such. We will be working from something like Testscape, as i said. Because its hardly edited. Atm i just want to know good servers what people like and enjoy to play on. Care to say?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Rating
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

Well,are you gonna edit the server source heavily or just change/add a little things?

Read full topic
